channel.title: Salesforce jobs
channel.description: A listing of jobs available at Salesforce

item.title: Call Centre - Workforce Analyst
item.job:description:
Do you use words like, dedicated, analytical and compassionate to describe yourself?

If you have answered YES then we have an opportunity for you that you cannot afford to miss out!

Ticketek is on the lookout for a Workforce Analyst to assist in rostering and scheduling located @ Ultimo, this role is truly a rare opportunity to get your foot in the door of the world of Workforce Management

The Workforce Analyst is responsible for all aspects of the schedule administration. The position requires the person to provide input and monitoring of schedules to ensure the campaigns KPI's are consistently being met.

Primary Duties:

·  Provide schedule administration support to the Contact Centre Manager and Operations and Technology Manager

·  Real time management of supply and demand variation factors

·  Update all records within the call centre and maintaining them

·  Data entry

What we are looking for are people who have:

·  Accurate data entry

·  Positive Attitude

·  Analytical thought processes

·  Ability to learn computer scheduling software

·  Knowledge of computer software such as Word and Excel (advanced Excel skills are highly desireable)

·  Ability to adhere to deadlines

·  Ability to deal with matters of a confidential nature

·  Communicate effectively across all levels and backgrounds

·  Administration experience

·  Knowledge of call centres and operational metrics highly desirable

This position is Monday to Friday 8:30am - 4.30pm, however due to the seasonality of events and call volumes, there are often exceptions to this.

If you think you have what it takes - APPLY NOW!

item.title: Genesys Engineer - Carlton based
item.description: We are looking for a highly experienced Genesys CTI Engineer. This is a permanent position located in Melbourne.
item.job:description:
Genesys CTI Engineer

We are looking for a highly experienced Genesys CTI Engineer. This is a permanent position located in Melbourne.

The successful candidate must have:

  • Solid prior experience with Genesys CTI Solutions.
  • Experience with Genesys Inbound, Outbound, WFM, and Reporting (Applicants without Genesys experience need not apply)
  • A demonstrated history of high performance in CTI technical areas.

The role of the Genesys CTI Engineer will include:

  • Perform system administration and support tasks
  • Deal with incidents escalated by the IT Support team as well as less urgent issues logged through the helpdesk system
  • Complete and document change requests to meet the specifications outlined by the Solutions Architect team, while maintaining appropriate design practices and standards
  • Provide ongoing support and maintenance of the Genesys / CTI environment
  • Provide a high level of customer service
  • Participate in rostered 24/7 Support of the Genesys Environment

We are looking for someone who has demonstrated the following skills already in their current role:

  • Sound written and oral communication
  • Detailed understanding of Help Desk/Customer Support process
  • Ability to display customer empathy
  • Familiarity with CTI concepts, capabilities and limitations
  • Excellent troubleshooting and problem solving skills
  • Familiarity with TDM and VOIP communication systems

Apply now, including cover letter and updated resume.

item.title: Ticketek are looking for Casual customer service agents!
item.description: Imagine…. The joy you will get from securing tickets to a finals match at the MCG for a proud and passionate AFL fan.
item.job:description:
Imagine….. The delight you will get from connecting Ticketek customers to their passions this September and October during the AFL Finals Series and the Australian Open on sales.

Imagine…. The thrill of selling front row tickets to the Men's Final at the Australian Open to a passionate tennis fan.

If this sounds like YOU, then read on!

Salmat Customer Contact Solutions is Australia's largest outsourced contact centre provider.

Here at Salmat we like to think that there is a project for everyone and if the thought of being an inbound sales agent and ally to sports gurus appeals….then this position is for you!!

Your goal as a Casual agent is to deliver excellence in sales and customer service; this will be achieved through providing the customers with tickets to sought after sporting events, answering customer queries, and ensuring that we are upholding the Ticketek name!

Casual agents on this campaign can work anywhere from 10-25 hours per week, with potential for more hours in some instances. You must be available to work on all of the following dates to be considered for this role.

  • Monday 30th August
  • Tuesday 31st August
  • Wednesday 1st September
  • Thursday 2nd September
  • Monday 6th September
  • Tuesday 7th September
  • Wednesday 8th September
  • Thursday 9th September
  • Friday 10th September
  • Monday 13th September
  • Tuesday 14th September
  • Wednesday 15 September
  • Thursday 16th September
  • Sunday 19 September
  • Monday 20th September
  • Tuesday 21st September
  • Wednesday 6th October
  • Monday 11th October

You will need to be available from 8.30am – 11.30am on each of the above dates; however this may be extended on a day to day basis.

This is a 2 month contract role finishing on Monday 11th October.

If successful for this role there will be 1 day of training to complete. Please be available for training on either Thursday 26th or Friday 27th August for training. Training dates will be confirmed with successful candidates.

The important details of the role are as follows:

  • This position is located in Ultimo.
  • The pay rate is $17.00 plus casual loadings as well as $1.00 OTE
  • This position starts on Monday 30th August, 2010, with training either Thursday 26th or Friday 27th August.

Time for a change? Apply NOW!!

item.title: Outbound Insurance Sales
item.description: Well Known Brand, Warm Outbound Sales, $24(OTE) Uncapped Commission
item.job:description:
Are you passionate about sales?

Driven by targets and uncapped commission?

This role is a license to print money!!

  • Contemporary Insurance Sales
  • Surry Hills Location
  • Well Known Brand
  • $24.00(OTE) + Uncapped Commission

Salmat Customer Contact Solutions - Australia's largest outsourced contact centre provider is looking for talented & passionate sales agents, these positions have become available due to the steady growth of our business.

Your skilled approach to relationship building + our focused training will assist you in achieving and exceeding your targets every time you come to work. As a Sales Agent you will be making warm outbound calls to existing customers offering them a range of contemporary insurance products.

You will be greatly rewarded for your efforts, so if you crave the satisfaction of making a sale and reaching your set targets while providing a positive experience for the customer, then this is definitely the role for you!

We will provide you with:

  • Full Time work commencing Monday, 24th August 2010
  • A competitive salary with an UNCAPPED earning potential
  • Paid product and system training
  • Access to accredited training including Certificate III in Customer Contact at no cost to you!
  • Supportive leadership and real career development

To maximise your success in this role you will need to:

  • Be skilled in the fine art of objection handling
  • Be self-motivated to meet (and exceed!) your potential in earnings
  • Be natural in your approach to selling and confident with your sales ability
  • Above all be determined to be the BEST
  • Have availability between 11:30am – 8pm Monday to Thursday and 10:30am – 5pm Friday

Previous experience in selling financial services is welcome but not essential. We're seeking people with a great attitude, enthusiasm to learn and contribute to personal and team sales targets.

Can you tick all the boxes? What are you waiting for?

APPLY NOW!!!

item.title: Inbound Sales and Customer Service
item.description: Australia's largest Telco and internet provider,$25.50 (OTE) per hour,Paid product and systems training
item.job:description:
It's time to put some fun back into your job!

You will love life here at our Surry Hills based contact centre!

  •  $25.50 (OTE) per hour
  •  Paid product and systems training
  •  Part-time – 20-30 hours a week

If you have experience in reaching targets/KPI's, have an interest in online gaming or simply enjoy surfing the net and downloading the latest music/movies then we want YOU to apply!

The Company: 

Salmat engages in more than 100 million conversations per year. Our contact centres within Salmat utilise our world class technology and highly trained staff to take and make calls on behalf of our blue chip clientele including household names such as Ticketek, Woolworths & Panasonic just to name a few!

Due to Salmat's success we are on a path of massive growth and we are searching for reliable, outgoing, motivated and hard-working individuals to join our LARGEST campaign in Sydney.  

The Role:

  • Australia's largest Telecommunication and internet services provider
  • Handling incoming calls from existing customers and assisting them with their enquiries
  • Part-time, availability must be between 8am – 9.30pm Friday, Saturday, Sunday, Monday only on a rotating roster.
  • Offering 20+ hours a week
  • Sales, cross-selling and up selling on all incoming calls
  • Full training in a fun and supportive environment
  • Penalty rates outside of our core business hours.

You must be available for 6 weeks Part-time training. Times for your paid training are Mon-Fri, 8.30am – 2.00pm commencing on the August 23rd

If you are customer focused and love to talk? Apply Now!!

item.title: Inbound Customer Service – Young & Funky!
item.description: Inbound Customer Service/Sales, $25.50(OTE), Fun, Focus & Fulfilment!
item.job:description:
Salmat Customer Contact Solutions is a business leader in one to one communications and Australia's leading outsourced contact centre provider representing over 50 well-known clients!

Here at Salmat we like to think that there is a project for everyone and if the thought of being an inbound sales agent and being able to service our valued customers makes you feel good about your job….then this position is for you!!

Your goal as a Full-time agent is to deliver excellence in sales and customer service, this will be achieved through communicating and assisting existing customers with their billing enquiries. You will be required to make sales, upsell and cross sell related products to their account with Australia's largest internet provider.

You must be available between Sunday to Thursday from 8am - 9:30pm on a rotating roster. You will be offered 38 hours per week.

If successful for this role there will be 4 weeks of full-time training between the hours of 9am - 4.30pm to complete commencing on 30th August

The important details of the role are as follows:

  • This position is located in Surry Hills.
  • The pay rate is $17.00 + up to $8.50 OTE
  • Penalty rates also apply outside of our core business hours
  • Full training in a fun and supportive environment.

Time for a change? Apply NOW!!
